string.name: signin_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Title of the dialog encouraging the user to enable Firebase App Distribution features

string.name: singin_dialog_message
string.translation_description: Content of the dialog encouraging the user to enable Firebase App Distribution features

resources.string: הפעלת תכונות בדיקה כמו התראות על גרסאות build חדשות ומשוב בתוך האפליקציה.

string.name: singin_yes_button
string.translation_description: Text on button to enable Firebase App Distribution features

string.name: singin_no_button
string.translation_description: Text on button to decline Firebase App Distribution features

string.name: update_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Title of the dialog explaining to the user that a new version of the application is available

string.name: update_version_available
string.translation_description: Version string (and code) of the available update

string.name: update_release_notes
string.translation_description: Text prefixing release notes

string.name: update_yes_button
string.translation_description: Text on button to start update

string.name: update_no_button
string.translation_description: Text on button to cancel update

string.name: downloading_app_update
string.translation_description: Title of the notification showing during download of update

resources.string: מתבצעת הורדה של עדכון בתוך האפליקציה…

string.name: download_completed
string.translation_description: Title of notification when download of update has completed

string.name: download_failed
string.translation_description: Title of notification when download of update has failed

string.name: install_failed
string.translation_description: Title of notification when installation of update has failed

string.name: notifications_group_name
string.translation_description: Title of the notification channel group for the SDK

string.name: app_update_notification_channel_name
string.translation_description: Name of the notification channel for in-app updates

string.name: app_update_notification_channel_description
string.translation_description: Description of the notification channel for in-app updates

resources.string: מוצגת ההתקדמות בהתקנה של העדכונים בתוך האפליקציה

string.name: feedback_launch_failed
string.translation_description: Toast explaining that launching the feedback functionality failed

string.name: feedback_unidentified_release
string.translation_description: Toast explaining feedback can't be provided, because release can't be found

resources.string: הגרסה לא נמצאה. ייתכן שהאפליקציה הזו לא הותקנה על ידי התכונה \'הפצת אפליקציות\', או שאין לך גישה יותר.

string.name: feedback_no_release
string.translation_description: Toast explaining that feedback would have been sent, but was not, since development mode was active

resources.string: המשוב היה נשלח, אבל הוא לא נשלח עקב מצב פיתוח.

string.name: feedback_notification_channel_name
string.translation_description: Name of the notification channel for in-app feedback

string.name: feedback_notification_channel_description
string.translation_description: Description of the notification channel for in-app feedback

resources.string: מוצגת התראה להזין משוב על האפליקציה

string.name: feedback_notification_title
string.translation_description: Title of notification encouraging testers to enter feedback

string.name: feedback_notification_text
string.translation_description: Text of notification encouraging testers to enter feedback for the app

resources.string: יש להקיש כדי להזין משוב על %1$s

string.name: unknown_sources_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Title of dialog describing that installation from unknown sources needs to be enabled

string.name: unknown_sources_dialog_description
string.translation_description: Text of dialog describing why installation from unknown sources needs to be enabled

resources.string: כדי להתקין את העדכון, צריך לאפשר התקנה ממקורות לא מוכרים

string.name: unknown_sources_yes_button
string.translation_description: Label on button launching settings to enable installation from unknown sources

string.name: back_button_description
string.translation_description: Description for image button (back) which aborts feedback

string.name: send_feedback
string.translation_description: Text next to send button which sends feedback

string.name: send_button_description
string.translation_description: Description of image button (send) which sends feedback

string.name: feedback_text_hint
string.translation_description: Default text hint displayed in the text box where user should type their feedback

resources.string: רוצה לשלוח לנו משוב? נשמח לשמוע איך נוכל לשפר את האפליקציה.

string.name: screenshot
string.translation_description: Text displayed next to the checkbox which can be toggled to include/exclude a screenshot with the feedback

string.name: no_screenshot
string.translation_description: Text displayed when there is no screenshot available to be included with the feedback

string.name: screenshot_image_description
string.translation_description: Description for the screenshot image
